Package ohos.multimedia.radio

Class RadioManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.multimedia.radio.RadioManager

  • public class RadioManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Sets radio attributes.

    The frequency modulation (FM) band range is 87.5 to 108 MHz, and the amplitude modulation (AM) band range is 531 to 1602 kHz.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#FM_RADIO

    • Method Detail

      • setMode

        public static int setMode​(ModeType mode)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                          ohos.rpc.RemoteException
        Sets the radio band type.

        When this method is called for the first time, AM and FM wave freqencies are set to their minimum values by default.

        Parameters:
        mode - Indicates the radio band type. Value 0 indicates FM broadcasting, 1 indicates AM broadcasting, and 2 indicates an invalid type.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 if the setting is successful; returns other values otherwise.
        Throws:
        ohos.rpc.RemoteException - Throws this exception if the underlying IPC communication fails.
        IllegalArguementException - Throws this exception if the application does not have the ohos.permission.radio.ACCESS_FM_AM permission.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Since:
        3

      • getMode

        public static int getMode​()
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                          ohos.rpc.RemoteException
        Obtains the radio band type that has been set.
        Returns:
        Returns the radio band type. Value 0 indicates FM broadcasting, and 1 indicates AM broadcasting.
        Throws:
        ohos.rpc.RemoteException - Throws this exception if the underlying IPC communication fails.
        IllegalArguementException - Throws this exception if the application does not have the ohos.permission.radio.ACCESS_FM_AM permission.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Since:
        3

      • step

        public static int step​(DirectionType direction,
                       ICallback callback)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                       ohos.rpc.RemoteException
        Adjusts the radio frequency by fixed value.

        The fixed value for increasing or decreasing an AM frequency is 9 Hz, and that for FM is 10 Hz. If the AM frequency is already the minimum frequency of the band range (531 kHz) and you set direction to 0, the target AM frequency will be the maximum frequency of the band range (1602 kHz).This also works for an FM frequency.

        Parameters:
        direction - Indicates the adjustment direction. Value 0 indicates that the frequency will be decreased by fixed value, and 1 indicates that the frequency will be increased by fixed value.
        callback - Indicates the callback that received radio program information.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 if the operation is successful; returns other values otherwise.
        Throws:
        ohos.rpc.RemoteException - Throws this exception if the underlying IPC communication fails.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the callback is null or the application does not have the ohos.permission.radio.ACCESS_FM_AM permission.
        Since:
        3

      • seek

        public static int seek​(DirectionType direction,
                       ICallback callback)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                       ohos.rpc.RemoteException
        Seeks for a radio frequency based on the adjustment direction set by the user.
        Parameters:
        direction - Indicates the adjustment direction. Value 0 indicates that the frequency will be decreased, and 1 indicates that the frequency will be increased.
        callback - Indicates the callback that received radio program information.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 if the operation is successful; returns other values otherwise.
        Throws:
        ohos.rpc.RemoteException - Throws this exception if the underlying IPC communication fails.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the callback is null or the application does not have the ohos.permission.radio.ACCESS_FM_AM permission.
        Since:
        3

      • tune

        public static int tune​(int channel,
                       ICallback callback)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                       ohos.rpc.RemoteException
        Tunes to the radio frequency set by the user.
        Parameters:
        channel - Indiactes the target radio frequency.
        callback - Indicates the callback that received radio program information.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 if the operation is successful; returns other values otherwise.
        Throws:
        ohos.rpc.RemoteException - Throws this exception if the underlying IPC communication fails.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the callback is null or the application does not have the ohos.permission.radio.ACCESS_FM_AM permission.
        Since:
        3

      • cancel

        public static int cancel​()
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                         ohos.rpc.RemoteException
        Cancels the search for radio station.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 if the search is canceled; returns other values otherwise.
        Throws:
        ohos.rpc.RemoteException - Throws this exception if the underlying IPC communication fails.

      • getProgramInfo

        public static ProgramInfo getProgramInfo​()
                                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                         ohos.rpc.RemoteException
        Obtains information about the current radio station.
        Returns:
        Returns information about the current radio station, including the signal strength, broadcasting frequency, stereo, and whether the signal strength meets the threshold.
        Throws:
        ohos.rpc.RemoteException - Throws this exception if the underlying IPC communication fails.
        IllegalArguementException - Throws this exception if the application does not have the ohos.permission.radio.ACCESS_FM_AM permission.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Since:
        3

      • getBandConfig

        public static BandConfig getBandConfig​()
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                       ohos.rpc.RemoteException
        Obtains registration information about the radio sation.
        Returns:
        Returns the registration information, including the lowest and highest band frequencies, broadcasting type, region, and channel spacing.
        Throws:
        ohos.rpc.RemoteException - Throws this exception if the underlying IPC communication fails.
        IllegalArguementException - Throws this exception if the application does not have the ohos.permission.radio.ACCESS_FM_AM permission.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Since:
        3
